other_title: Anche se il mondo finisse domani: The Relative Worlds (Italian)
Ashita Sekai ga Owaru to Shite mo (Japanese)
あした世界が終わるとしても (Japanese)
plot: Shin and Kotori are both third years in high school. Shin lost his mother when he was little, and since then he has a tendency to close himself off. Kotori is his childhood friend who always looks out for him. One day, another "self" from another Japan appears in front of them.
